snippet: Eric T. Schneiderman, the New York attorney general, is expected to announce a settlement Wednesday that would create an independent monitor of the college’s management and finances.
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman will announce agreement to end litigation over Cooper Union for Advancement of Science and Art's decision to charge tuition for first time; settlement will establish independent monitor of institution's management and finances; agreement could lead to restoration of free tuition at Cooper Union.
lead_paragraph: Eric T. Schneiderman, the New York attorney general, is expected to announce a settlement Wednesday that would create an independent monitor of the college’s management and finances.

headline.main: New York Attorney General Reaches Deal to End Litigation at Cooper Union
headline.print_headline: State Reaches a Deal to End Litigation at Cooper Union

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art
